1.name: Steadfast
1.details: Colossus does not scale on attack speed, but his basic attack deals additional physical damage (scaling with maximum health) to all enemies in a straight line.

2.name: Shield Bash
2.details:
Colossus bashes the enemies in a cone-shaped direction with his shield, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies in the area.

Shield Bash also slightly knocks the enemies back and briefly slows them.

3.name: Tumble
3.details: Colossus tumbles to a target direction, gaining increased armour (scaling with armour) and magic resist (scaling with magic resist) for a duration.

4.name: Valiant Charge
4.details:
Colossus charges at a target enemy, pushing the target back along the way and dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power).

If the target is knocked onto a wall, Valiant Charge will stun the target for a short duration, dealing additional physical damage (scaling with physical power).

5.name: Unbreakable Wall
5.details:
Colossus holds up his shield and creates a giant wall that blocks all projectiles including ultimate, except turret blasts.

Colossus also gains increased movement speed and the ability to move through units. However, he can only use Valiant Charge during Unbreakable Wall.

Using Valiant Charge during Unbreakable Wall will have a much wider wall range and can push multiple enemies at once.
